![](/sites/default/files/2024-03/Miho%20Cropped.jpg)

Sep 17, 2025

Miho Hind: Preparing For Technical Training 

In 2024, we shared the inspirational story of Miho Hind – a newcomer and new mom who found a supportive community in her new career as a plumbing apprentice. We connected with her on the eve of her starting level 3 technical training to see how she is doing.

[ Learn more](/miho-hind-preparing-technical-training)

#####  [5 Maker Activities You Can Do At Home with Your Kids ](/maker-activities-to-do-at-home)

We've put together a list of 5 fun and educational trades related activities you can do at home with your kids.

Mar 27, 2020

#####  [First Nations School Ignites Passion for Trades ](/first-nations-school-passion-for-trades)

High school and elementary students came together to build friendship benches, showing how exciting the trades can be.

![](/sites/default/files/styles/square_mobile_1x/public/2022-11/Amy%20Carr_0.png.webp?itok=gBO_fRPg)

Mar 09, 2020

#####  [International Women's Day Series: Amy Carr](/amy-carr)

As a woman in a trades profession, she’s seen lots of positive change in eight years – such as being taken seriously by other trades and their foremen, far more support on site – but there’s much more still needed.
